document_data.name: Internal combustion engine
document_data.creator: [[Church of Gond]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Internal combustion engine''' were a type of massive, experimental machinery. They could only be found in the innermost rooms of major [[Gond]] temples, off limits to all but the high-ranking clergy of [[Church of Gond|the church]].These engines were specifically noted as resembling what we would call "rotative beam engines."
document_data.Description: These machines required [[oil]] to function and were liable to experience explosions.
